Vykos: Very machiavellian of you, I admit, but you risk our hands 
too much. What if we make Unicron believe that the Maximals have the 
Matrix so he sends warriors on them? They would get hurt much more 
than we would.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> P. Hydras:
> 
> "Not sure... "said gloomy Hydras"Maximals have the clue to find 
> MAtrix of leadership, that's it's the only thing that can defeat 
> that monster and Unicron doesn't need to strike a deal with us. In 
> order to defeat him, and regarding that I haven't your wise 
opinion, 
> I tought that was good idea set a temporaly peace with them and 
work 
> together to defeat him... After that I was thinking destroy them 
or 
> even use the peace to do a plan where I can destroy Unicron and at 
> the same timekill most maximals as can... Regarding their heroic 
> circuits, won't be dificult to force, them to lead them to a 
> vuluntary sacrifice... "
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > Lord Vykos was thoughtful for a moment.
> > 
> > Vykos: We have two options. First we wait for an attack by 
Unicron 
> > and make sure that the Maximals fail. This will be a blow at 
their 
> > morale. Then, we make sure that word gets around that they were 
> > actually responsible for their defeat.
> > 
> > He stopped for a moment.
> > 
> > Vykos: Or, we strike a deal with the devil and ally with 
Unicron. 
> > Would that be possible?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> 
wrote:
> > > P. Hydras::
> > > 
> > > "I like it, mylord"replied the male"But, how coult we do that 
> while 
> > > we deal with a massive trouble named Unicron?"
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> 
wrote:
> > > > Lord Vykos smiled evilly at Hydras' use of proper titles.
> > > > 
> > > > Vykos: Please Hydras, sit down for now.
> > > > 
> > > > He clapped his hands and a smaller chair simply unfolded 
from 
> the 
> > > > floor.
> > > > 
> > > > Vykos: I am here because of the Maximals. You should know by 
> now 
> > > that 
> > > > those pretentious Tripredacus have taken Cybertron and 
control 
> it 
> > > > with an Iron Fist. The refugees of the war, both Maximals 
and 
> > > > Predacons, fled to Earth and tried to work together. Fools 
> they 
> > > are! 
> > > > They simply deny their true nature as heirs to the 
Decepticons!
> > > > 
> > > > He looked at Hydras straight in his eyes.
> > > > 
> > > > Vykos: We have to let news of Maximal failures reach Modern 
> day 
> > > > Earth. We have to show our lost brothers that only they hold 
> the 
> > > keys 
> > > > to the future! However, I have only limited manpower. Even 
> though 
> > > > Warghoul is powerful, he cannot do things alone. What do you 
> > think 
> > > of 
> > > > my little plan?
> > > > 
> > > > Meanwhile, Warghoul identified the new Megatron. He gathered 
> all 
> > > the 
> > > > informations he could with a thorough scan and compiled it 
in 
> his 
> > > > hard drive.
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> 
> wrote:

> > > > > 
> > > > > Puppet Hydras go inside and waited that Vykos let him sat

> > > > > tone"what do you wish speak with me?"
